text: @GovWhitmer @GovPritzker @GovMikeDeWine @GovEvers @GovTimWalz @GovHolcomb @GovAndyBeshear Witchmer you did nothing extra to reduce the spread of Covid-19 in the city of Detroit.  You are a do nothing person.
